title: Introduction to Programming

faqs.question: What is a variable?
faqs.answer: A variable is a storage location, with a specific type and an associated name.

category.name: Programming
category.description: Courses related to programming and software development.

description: This course introduces the basics of programming.

title: Web Development Basics

faqs.question: What is HTML?
faqs.answer: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language. It is used to design the structure of web pages.

description: This course introduces the basics of web development.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms

faqs.question: What is a data structure?
faqs.answer: A data structure is a particular way of organizing and storing data in a computer so that it can be accessed and modified efficiently.

description: This course covers the basics of data structures and algorithms.

title: Machine Learning for Beginners

faqs.question: What is machine learning?
faqs.answer: Machine learning is a type of artificial intelligence (AI) that allows software applications to become more accurate in predicting outcomes without being explicitly programmed to do so.

description: This course introduces the basics of machine learning.

title: Introduction to Databases

faqs.question: What is a database?
faqs.answer: A database is an organized collection of data stored and accessed electronically.

description: This course introduces the basics of databases.
